title: Need Justice üò¢(Account Got Hacked)
body:
Dear reader, I got my account hacked last year sometime, Summoner Name: Its Just a Prank 
the person that hacked it was using scripts and had got my account permanently banned. I have been using a temporary account ever since but I want to get my old acc back as it was from season 2 and i had invested a LOT of money & time into it. I ended up sending a ticket with no luck and no hope, i know it would be hard for Riot to trust me but if you can check the ip before the account got suspended you could see, i feel like I've been robbed and riot can't do anything about it? I know i left it too late but i just gave up instantly. All that time/money just gone into thin air {{item:3070}}. Is there any way I can combat this claim or at least get the skins transferred over to my new account I've tried many avenues like Facebook, Reddit etc just want my old account back any help is much appreciated, Thanks ‚úåÔ∏è

replies.body:
hey I have just had the same thing happened to me. like 3 days ago my account got hacked!. they have changed my user name and my email address could someone HELP ME PLEASE.. FYI my summoner name is KID ZILLAH as like you i have spent alot of money on this account and im from the S2 aswell and I don't want all my effort and time into this account to have it get hacked! without knowing I tried to get it back. please someone help me. im currently still playing on my brothers account but wish it was my own -.-!.
{{champion:105}}

Hey there Xizera,

Can I get you to [submit another ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for me and provide the ticket number in a reply to me here, thanks.

Expect responses to this ticket to take longer than usual.
